job.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER - WI Based
job.description: If you are a software engineer with experience, please read on!Top Reasons to Work with UsWe are a fast growing technology services company with multiple Midwest locations, serving commercial, public sectors, and varying business' in their tech and IT needs.What You Will Be DoingThis position is responsible for design, coding, unit testing, and documentation of applications for Heartlands customers. This position will also work closely with other Team Members and clients to provide custom .NET and CMS based software solutions. In addition, this position will also meet with new and existing clients to frame up and estimate new solutions.What You Need for this PositionRequired Experiencel 6+ years of experience building web-based applications in Microsoft stackl 4+ years of experience working with .NET including C#, ASP.NET, MVC, AOD.NET/Entity Framework, HTML, CSS, and JavaScriptl 4+ years of experience working with object oriented development, utilizing design patterns, as well as, SQL utilizing MS SQL Server and source code repos (GIT, TFS, Azure DevOps)Preferred Experiencel 3 + years of experience developing applications using Kentico or another CMSl 1+ years of experience developing Xamarin apps, cloud first applications in Microsoft Azure, and IoT applicationsl 1+ years of experience with React, Vue, Node, and CI/CD automated pipelinesWhat's In It for You Vacation/PTO Medical Bonus: (up to 15k) 401k Company Car Cell Phone Paid ForSo, if you have experience, please apply today!Email Your Resume In Word ToLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:Luke.Pallo@CyberCoders.comPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : LP10-1645564 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***Luke Pallo - Recruiter - CyberCodersApplicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
